Class ComplexItem

java.lang.Object
  Item
      ComplexItem

public class ComplexItem
extends Item

This class is part of the "Eternal Destiny" application. "Eternal Destiny" is a text based adventure game. A complex item is an item that contains other items. (Backpack, toolbox, etc.)

Version:
3.21.14
Author:
Andrea Siejna
